name: Mice Tea
description:
Mice Tea is a story-driven visual novel full of emotion, romance, and a woman turning into a mouse. Or sometimes a mink. Or sometimes... well, there's a lot of different things she and her friends turn into.

Margaret de Campos is a young clerk at a local bookstore who needs some change in her life. Her job feels like a dead end, her love life is in a rut, and she's not happy with how she looks. All of that is upended when she stumbles upon a box of magical tea with the tendency to transform people into anthropomorphic animals. Depending on your choices, the lives of Margaret, her friends, and her coworkers are irrevocably changed as the story leads to several wildly different paths. Help Margaret find love and a deeper understanding of herself and her... proclivities by playing Mice Tea!

Features

  • Four romanceable characters, both male and female, each with multiple transformations and multiple endings
  • Tons of fetishes including anthro transformation, gender bending, body expansion, size play, bondage, exhibitionism, hypnotism, femdom, and more
  • Over 100 fully-illustrated images of transformation, intimacy, and action
  • Fully expressive characters, each with multiple outfits, including shoes. They're off screen most of the time, but trust us, they're there!
  • Original soundtrack with over two dozen tracks
  • Loads of accessibly options, including screen-reader support, content guidance, and SFW toggles including the ability to skip sex scenes
  • This VN is super queer
  • There's also a straight guy. He's really nice!
